test_cases.description: Test that main successfully fetches and displays users when UserService returns a non-empty list.
test_cases.name: test_successful_user_fetch_and_display

test_setup.given: UserService.fetch_all_users returns a list of user objects; display_users and setup_logging are working normally.
test_setup.then: Users are fetched and displayed; no errors are logged.

test_cases.description: Test that main handles the case where UserService returns an empty list of users.
test_cases.name: test_successful_empty_user_list

test_setup.given: UserService.fetch_all_users returns an empty list; display_users can display empty lists.
test_setup.then: No users are displayed, but no errors are logged.

test_cases.description: Test error handling when UserService.fetch_all_users raises an exception.
test_cases.name: test_fetch_users_raises_exception

test_setup.given: UserService.fetch_all_users raises an Exception with message 'Database unavailable'.
test_setup.then: Error 'Failed to retrieve users: Database unavailable' is logged; display_users is not called.

test_cases.description: Test error handling when display_users raises an exception after successful user fetch.
test_cases.name: test_display_users_raises_exception

test_setup.given: UserService.fetch_all_users returns a valid list, but display_users raises an Exception with message 'Display error'.
test_setup.then: Error 'Failed to retrieve users: Display error' is logged.

test_cases.description: Test behavior when setup_logging itself raises an exception.
test_cases.name: test_setup_logging_raises_exception

test_setup.given: setup_logging raises an Exception with message 'Logging setup failed'.
test_setup.then: Program terminates with 'Logging setup failed' exception; no further code is executed.

test_cases.description: Test behavior when UserService instantiation fails.
test_cases.name: test_user_service_constructor_raises_exception

test_setup.given: UserService constructor raises Exception with message 'Init error'.
test_setup.then: Program terminates with 'Init error' exception; no users are fetched or displayed.
